subject: How to test main() method ??
msgSnippet: I need info on how to go about testing the main() method. Should it really be tested? If yes, what are the various ways in which this can be done? Where can I
messageBody:
I need info on how to go about testing the main() method. Should it
really be tested? If yes, what are the various ways in which this can
be done?
Where can I find more resources (preferrably online) on this issue?

Thanks.
